text: hi my name is mike graham and i'm the
producer and director for story of Jesus
that's produced every year here in
wauchula Florida my second job is pastor
at real life church I've been playing
the part of Jesus for nearly 30 years
and I'm 58 now Jesus was 33 so it's
taking more and more makeup as the years
go by until I get the makeup and the
beard and the costumes on I really don't
even pretend to try to fill the
character I've got to be completely
transformed physically and then all of
the trappings and everything that's
around the entire cast the way they
respond to the character of Jesus really
makes it possible to play that part I'm
very humbled by it I never felt that I
could do it justice it's an honor to do
it and it's always been a real struggle
to try to display that role because it
is so challenging the story of Jesus is
produced in the Cattleman's arena in
what Shula which is not the ideal place
for a play so not a theater at all was
built for rodeos and so we actually have
to go in there and drape half of the
building in black ground cover to give
it that theatre appearance and over the
years we've been building the set since
we started it's been an evolution that
just has has taken 20 years to get it to
where it is today what do you want me
that Brandon the cast for the story of
Jesus includes animals and people there
are somewhere between 250 and 275 people
it varies from night tonight actually
because they're all volunteers some are
working and can't make it every night
we do full makeup on every cast member
we really have no extras everybody's
important and so everyone's given a lot
of attention down to every detail
because we want them to look as
authentic as possible for the day and
time that Christ lived and walked on the
earth and then our animal cast which we
call them a cast because they don't just
make a showcase appearance there in most
of the scenes in the play and this year
there are about a hundred and forty it
looks like that will be coming on stage
several different times throughout the
evening on pilot scene remember to watch
terry Johnson's arm so you know what the
whip is doing if you can't physically
see it when people encounter the simple
story of Jesus without anything else
interfering there's just no way in the
world that can't be affected it's
overwhelming to know that people's lives
are main we already changed their tune
so tonight can easily be the greatest
night of the year because the first
night right ok so it's got to be good
